dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Ms. Herseth Sandlin introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Veteransâ€™ Affairs

form.official-title: To amend title 38, United States Code, relating to equitable relief with respect to a State or private employer.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Injunctive Relief for Veterans Act of 2008.
Section 4323(e) of title 38, United States Code, is amended by striking may use and inserting shall use, in any case in which the court determines it is appropriate,.
